statements: UPDATE electric_vehicle_battery SET battery_capacity = 500, charge_level = 80.5 WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE electric_vehicle_battery SET last_maintenance_date = '2021-09-15 10:30:00', battery_health = 0.85 WHERE vehicle_id = '567e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE electric_vehicle_battery SET charge_level = 80, battery_health = 0.75 WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE electric_vehicle_battery SET battery_capacity = 100, last_maintenance_date = '2023-10-15 15:30:00' WHERE vehicle_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9012-123456789012';
UPDATE battery_data SET health_status='Good', battery_charge=80.5 WHERE vehicle_id=12345;
UPDATE vehicle_info SET year=2022, battery_capacity=75.5, manufacturer='Tesla' WHERE vehicle_id=54321;
UPDATE battery_data SET battery_charge = 87.5, health_status = 'Good' WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
UPDATE vehicle_info SET battery_capacity = 55.8, manufacturer = 'Tesla', model = 'Model X' WHERE vehicle_id = 54321;
UPDATE BatteryLife SET battery_percentage = 75, estimated_range = 300, last_charge_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 123
UPDATE VehicleDetails SET make = 'Tesla', model = 'Model S', year = 2022, max_speed = 155 WHERE vehicle_id = 456
UPDATE BatteryLife SET estimated_range = 250.75, battery_percentage = battery_percentage + 5 WHERE vehicle_id = 1001;

UPDATE battery_info SET battery_percentage = 80.5, charging_status = 'Charging' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
